headline: Is Simon Property Group (SPG) Pricing Look Attractive After Strong Multi‑Year Share Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Simon Property Group is reasonably priced or potentially offering value right now, starting with the current share price and what sits behind it can help frame your view. The stock last closed at US$184.32, with returns of 0.2% year to date and 10.1% over the past year, alongside longer term returns of 72.8% over three years and 142.8% over five years. These figures give helpful context for any valuation check. Recent attention on Simon Property Group has...
